entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries north of Cape Ray. Amount 2 cm north of Cape Ray. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023
